paragraph.paragraph:
A virtual file folder's properties are accessible from the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfPropertyBrowser.htmproperties window. To view the properties window:
Select an virtual file folder in your EiffelEnvision ../../../structure/project.xmlProject.
Choose View, Properties menu. The properties window may also been shown for any selected item by pressing the F4 keyboard shortcut or by choosing Properties from a virtual file folder's context menu.

Folder Name
The name of the folder, the same as in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer window.
